messages.title: LOCAL PRIORITIES for Denton and Reddish
messages.content: Campaigning for better local health services, Working for a fair deal for pensioners and families, Improving standards in education and training, Securing new affordable homes to buy and rent, Cracking down on crime and anti-social behaviour, Freezing energy bills and scrapping the bedroom tax
